column3:
Will comfortably hold 4 cards and 6-10 bills.Upcycled 
from scrap leather.  In stock in a variety of leather and thread 
colors.

Protects earbuds and prevents tangled 
cords.  Upcycled scrap leather.  In stock in various colors

Keep small tools and supplies organized.  Hand-waxed 
vegtan leather. As shown: 8.5 by 5 inches, one internal slant 
pocket.

Perfectly fits writing paper, envelopes, stamps, an 
pens.  6oz. vegtan leather hand-coated with beeswax for stiff, 
water-resistant protection for your important 
papers.

Standard size fits most glasses.  Hand-waxed 
vegtan.

Fits most disposable lighter brands.  1.25" split 
ring.  Made from upcycled scrap leather.  In stock in a variety of leather and 
thread colors.

Various sizes and fittings. Hand-waxed vegtan or 
upcycled scrap leather.
